sentences.en: Any self - evolver must be a coyote trickster.
sentences.cn: 所有自进化者必须是像土狼一样高明的魔术师.

sentences.en: Far up the west rim of the canyon, a coyote yipped twice.
sentences.cn: 远处峡谷的西缘，一只丛林狼嚎叫了两声。

sentences.en: Fire Coyote Co + Yo + Te Increases physical resistance. Increases burn spell level.
sentences.cn: 火焰增加物理抗性, 增加火焰灼伤效果等级.

sentences.en: Now and again the hunter can hear a long - draw dolorous whine of some unseen coyote.
sentences.cn: 猎人不时能听见某只看不见的小林狼发出的拖长的哀嚎.

sentences.en: The God of the American Plateau Indian was Coyote.
sentences.cn: 美洲高原印第安人的上帝是郊狼.

sentences.en: The hunter killed coyote with a gun.
sentences.cn: 这名猎人用枪猎杀一头郊狼.

sentences.en: The Indian hurled his spear at the coyote.
sentences.cn: 那印地安人将他的长矛用力掷向那只土狼.

sentences.en: The roadrunner pulled the string, and a whole bag of rocks fell upon the coyote.
sentences.cn: 长尾鸟拉了一下绳子, 一袋子的石块掉下来砸在草原狼的身上.

sentences.en: The sheriff announced a bounty of 15 dollars for the pelt of every coyote killed.
sentences.cn: 那位长官宣布每张杀死的狼皮付15美元的赏金.

sentences.en: They lived over around Coyote Canyon someplace.
sentences.cn: 他们住在凯奥特峡谷一带。

sentences.en: We are seeing coyote fees go up to $ 1 , 500 to $ 2 , 500 per person.
sentences.cn: 我们正看到人均费用涨到了1500美金到2500美金.

sentences.en: We spin around to see a coyote in hot pursuit of a panicked rabbit.
sentences.cn: 一转身,一只草原狼正追逐一只受惊的兔子.

sentences.en: You can find one coyote with a wonky jaw in the desert?
sentences.cn: 你可以在沙漠里找到一只下巴异常的狼?

trans.tran_cn: 郊狼（北美洲西部原野上的小狼），丛林狼，草原狼
trans.tran_en: A coyote is a small wolf which lives in the plains of North America
